title: Interpretation of the door in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a door in a dream and what its meanings are. In fact, we see in our daily lives many incomprehensible dreams that make us curious to know their meaning, such as a dream about a door that has many positions between opening. A closed door or door, and we may see it as new, old, broken, or cracked, but does this symbolize the dreamer’s good appearance or does the interpretation of the dream differ according to the same situation? The encyclopedia that will answer this question will give you the most important interpretations of this dream according to what was narrated by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the door in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a closed door means postponing maintenance and perhaps postponing marriage. Breaking the door in a dream indicates the presence of problems in the dreamer’s house. Seeing a door stolen in a dream indicates the dreamer’s failure to achieve his dreams. If a man sees in a dream that he is changing the door, then this dream either indicates improvement or poor living conditions. An open door in a dream indicates kindness and living, represented by getting a job or the opportunity to travel Ibn Sirin interpreted that a new door in a dream indicates a new stage that the dreamer is entering. Seeing a burning door in a dream is an unpleasant vision that indicates something unpleasant for the dreamer. Interpretation of the door in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that whoever sees the door opening in his dream, this indicates Goodness, livelihood, and the end of problems in his life, and God knows best. Seeing an open door may indicate the birth of children, and God knows best. If a person sees himself repairing the door, this indicates kindness, nourishment, and the end of worries and problems. Whoever sees in his dream that he is trying to open a door but does not succeed, then this The dream means that he is going through great distress in reality. Opening the door in a dream means happiness, kindness, and sustenance for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a door for a single woman: Seeing the door open in a dream has several indicators, the most important of which is that it indicates opening the doors of food and goodness. Seeing the door in a dream means achieving what he dreamed about. The dreamer of the vision. If a single woman sees in her dream that she is opening the door, this indicates kindness and livelihood represented by obtaining a new job opportunity. A closed door in a single woman’s dream indicates that she is facing many problems in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a door for a married woman: seeing a broken door Or torn in a married woman’s dream indicates her separation from her husband, and God knows best. Seeing a closed door in a married woman’s dream indicates the problems and conflicts that she is going through in her life. In a married woman’s dream, the old door symbolizes the problems and worries that she suffers from, but if the door is new It symbolizes her stability in her married life. Whoever sees an iron door in her dream, this heralds goodness for her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a door for a pregnant woman: Seeing a door in general in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she has given birth to a male child, and God knows best. An old door in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates fatigue. Which she suffers from during pregnancy, and God knows best. The new door in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the beginning of a new stage for her, which is childbirth. These were the most prominent interpretations of the door in

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a Salafi’s son in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a predecessor's son in a dream Scholars provide different interpretations about the interpretation of a dream to see a predecessor's son in a dream, so we present what it means, all this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream to see a predecessor's son in a dream The interpretation of a dream to see a predecessor's son in a dream can be a sign of kindness and sustenance, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his predecessor's son in a dream, this may lead to strong relationships, and God has knowledge of the unseen. If the dreamer sees his predecessor's son in a dream, it may be a sign of sustenance, and God knows best If a married woman sees her predecessor's son crying, this may be a sign of her liberation from worries, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a predecessor without a veil in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a predecessor without a veil in a dream can indicate separation, and God knows best Seeing your predecessor in a dream without a veil may indicate her separation from her husband, and God knows best When a married woman sees her predecessor in a dream, this may indicate the revelation of secrets, and God knows best. Also, the interpretation of a dream of your predecessor without a veil for a veiled woman in a dream can be a sign of sadness, and God knows best. I dreamed that my grandfather was sick in a dream I dreamed that my predecessor He was sick in a dream, which can express worry and sadness, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is sick in a dream, this may indicate distress, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees helping his sick predecessor in a dream, this may lead to treating the family and relatives well, and God knows best. Also, seeing your predecessor sick in a dream can indicate unexpected things, and God knows best. I dreamed that my predecessor was crying in a dream. I dreamed that my predecessor was crying in a dream. Seeing my predecessor crying can indicate unpromising things, and God knows best. When I saw my predecessor crying and crying in a dream, it may be calamities, and God knows best. If a married woman sees her predecessor crying and crying in a dream, it may be evidence of trouble, and God knows best. While seeing your predecessor happy in a dream means good news, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife naked in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an ex-wife in a dream, which may indicate the sins he commits, and God knows best. Also, seeing my ex-husband naked can indicate mistakes and bad things he does, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband naked, this may result in her ex-husband’s inability to abandon sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing my ex-husband naked can also indicate her ex-husband’s preoccupation, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband cheating on me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband cheating on me in a dream may indicate an opportunity to return to the ex-wife, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is cheating on her in a dream, it may portend good, and God knows best. Also, seeing a divorced woman cheating on her in a dream can indicate a conspiracy Which you fall into, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Perhaps seeing absolute betrayal in a dream leads to success, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband wearing my clothes in a dream. Interpretation of dreams

title: What you have never heard of is to see gifts in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of gifts in a dream is one of the most important interpretations that many people wonder about, due to the many stimuli that this vision carries. Their vision differs from that of a man, and the interpretation of a dream about gifts in a dream varies depending on the types of gifts. Interpretation of a dream about gifts in a dreamWe all know that gifts are actually a symbol of friendship and love. The Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - said about gifts: (Give to one another out of love for one another ), and therefore seeing gifts in a dream has an important interpretation, because it can refer to more than one meaning, it can refer to meanings. Positive and can indicate negative meanings, and here is the interpretation of seeing gifts in a dream: When someone sees in a dream that he is giving a gift to another person, this may indicate an increase in your generosity towards people in general, in the event that someone sees that he is giving many gifts to the same person. This may be an indication of your urgent desire to gain this person’s approval of you. It may also indicate that you are clearly benefiting from your relationship with this person. When a person sees in a dream another person receiving a gift and feels jealous in the dream because he did not receive a gift like him, this indicates that This person suffers from jealousy in many matters of life. When someone sees in a dream that someone has given him a gift, this clearly indicates that this person is one of the favorite people and is highly accepted by others. When a person sees in a dream that he finds what he gave... A good book, it was a sign of the good news that he would soon receive from one of his close friends who was estranged from him in exile. If one dreams that someone on his birthday gave him a bouquet of beautiful roses, this is evidence that this person will achieve great success in his life in more From a field. When a person sees in his dream that he has been given by more than one person, it means that these people appreciate his efforts for them. This gift was an appreciation to him for this effort. If a person sees in a dream that he is opening a gift that someone gave him This may mean that he must be very careful when expressing his feelings to people. Whoever sees in a dream that he is sending a valuable gift to someone by mail, this means that this person will come to him with a rare opportunity that can significantly change his life for the better, but he will ignore it. When a person sees in a dream that he received a valuable gift, this means that he will reveal the secrets of very important matters. If he sees in a dream that he received a gift of gold, this means that joy will come to him, followed by sadness. But if he sees that he received a gift of silver, then this It indicates that this person will be happy to meet God Almighty, whether it is prayer, fasting, or otherwise. Gifts in a dream by Fahd Al-OsaimiWhen someone sees in his dream that someone is giving him a gift, it means that this person who gave him a gift in his dream will have the best support. To him in difficult situations and that he will always stand by his side and will not hide from him. When a person sees in a dream that he is receiving a gift from another person, this is the best evidence that this person...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing meat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing meat in a dream in detail. Meat is one of the most common things a person sees in a dream, and with successive visions, the dreamer begins searching here and there to find out an interpretation and meaning. Seeing and seeing meat in a dream is similar depending on the type of meat, whether it is beef or lamb, or according to its condition. Whether it is raw or cooked, therefore we present to you on the Takiya website a special section for meat, interpretation of dreams in detail by the great dream interpreters. In light of this, today we discuss in our article the interpretation of a dream about meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing meat in a dream for married people who are pregnant. And unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about seeing meat by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation of seeing meat in a dream that cooked meat indicates wealth and abundance of goodness. Interpretation of a dream when you see uncooked meat in a dream indicates illness and problems. Seeing buying meat from a butcher indicates a test for the dreamer. What awaits him. Seeing tender meat, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, indicates death. As for seeing beef meat in a dream, it indicates an illness that afflicts the dreamer. Seeing camel meat in a dream means that the dreamer will obtain money from an enemy. As for whoever dreams of eating camel meat without cooking it This indicates that the dreamer has wronged a woman. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he ate the meat of a sheep, then this indicates the dreamer’s abundant kindness. As for the one who dreams that he only saw a sheep without eating from it, then this is not his ruling. It is desirable for him to see it. Seeing slices of meat In a dream, it indicates evil over and over again, and sometimes it indicates goodness, living, and joy. Seeing cut meat indicates problems and quarrels and may indicate that the woman is pregnant. If the dreamer sees that he is eating live meat, he will reap large sums of money from his enemies, which is a good thing for him. For him in general. Interpretation of the dream of seeing meat according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing meat in Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation indicates that the dreamer will gain a lot of wealth, but will lose it. When seeing slices of meat, this indicates that the dreamer will get rid of his worries and problems in which he lives. If he sees a different person Married meat in his dream, it means that he will get married soon. Seeing cutting meat in the house indicates many misfortunes that have entered this house. Al-Nabulsi seeing himself cutting tender meat, interprets that the dreamer will fall ill with a disease that leads to death. Seeing someone in a dream with yellow meat indicates Fatigue, dizziness, and a serious illness. Interpretation of a dream about meat for a single woman: For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that she is cooking meat means that she is in a relationship with a man, but she will hurt him and go bankrupt and will not marry him. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating cooked meat, this means that she will form an attachment bond, But she will lose a lot in this relationship. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is buying meat or selling meat, this means that she will marry her lover. For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that she is eating grilled meat means that she will enter into immoral relationships and abandon her principles. Interpretation A dream about meat for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cooked meat for a dead woman

title: Interpretation of a faucet in a dream, a faucet in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream about fountains for an unmarried woman. For a married woman, water flowing from the ground for a pregnant woman. Water coming out of the ground is a colored fountain by Ibn Sirin. The symbol of the fountain in a dream. Seeing a fountain is a sign of happiness, pleasure, marriage, or pregnancy. Seeing a fountain often indicates feelings, sensations, and emotional relationships. Seeing a fountain without water means that the dreamer He will find himself in a relationship against his will. Seeing yourself drinking from a fountain indicates the search for spiritual balance, and drinking plenty of water is saturated with knowledge, knowledge and wisdom. Seeing a fountain spitting juice indicates prosperity. Seeing a fountain spitting milk is a sign of a new birth in the family. Seeing clear tap water is a sign of victory. Seeing tap water indicates Upside down to difficulties and fearsIf you dream that you saw a clean tap sparkling in the sunlight, this means huge possessions, pleasant pleasures and pleasant travels. A cloudy fountain means betrayal of friends and unhappiness in business and love affairs. A broken or dry tap means death and cessation of pleasures. If a girl sees a fountain sparkling in the moonlight, This portends reckless pleasure that could lead to ruin.YouTube Fountain Vision

title: Interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream: One of the goals of a woman’s life is to have a child after marriage, and this stage for a woman is considered one of the happiest stages of a woman’s life because she feels the meaning of motherhood in stages. From her life, the subconscious mind, as we previously learned that because there are many ideas related to the conscious mind, the subconscious mind takes them and presents them in a dream that the girl sees in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a boy and a child in a dream by Ibn SirinIf one sees in a dream a group of male children. This vision expresses his closeness to success and excellence in his life, and his ability to achieve all his goals. If a person sees in a dream a baby being breastfed. This vision symbolizes the abundance of food, and the availability of goodness to whoever sees it. Seeing a person in a dream that he has been blessed with a group of male children. This vision indicates that many troubles are coming, and sorrows will come to the one who sees it, and these pains will go away from the dreamer later. If a young man sees in a dream a small child. This vision symbolizes his close marriage, and getting rid of all the problems and fears that a person faces in his life. Seeing a person in a dream that he is breastfeeding a small child. This vision expresses the forbidden money that this person obtains. Whoever sees in his dream that he is touching a small child. This indicates that he will soon have a lot of money. If one sees in a dream that he is carrying a child. This indicates the high positions that the dreamer will move to and the abundant money that will come to him. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees in a dream a son of an unmarried womanIf an unmarried girl sees a child in her dream. This vision expresses her imminent marriage. Whoever sees a child in his dream and does not remember his characteristics. This vision expresses that he will soon find himself in great trouble. Seeing a boy in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes problems in her love life, which may lead to separation. If a single girl who is suffering from many problems in her life sees a boy in a dream. Such a vision expresses immediate relief for this girl. If an unmarried girl dreams of a boy with baby hair, this indicates her close separation from her lover. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream means that she is carrying a child in her arms. There is someone who loves her very much and wants to communicate with her. A single girl sees herself buying a boy. This vision expresses the presence of many problems and difficulties that she will face soon. Interpretation of seeing a handsome child for an unmarried woman in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a “boy” who is distinguished by her beauty. This vision is the imminent news of her marriage. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream with a beautiful child expresses her repentance, integrity, and abandonment of her sins and violations that she constantly commits. A single girl seeing in a dream a beautiful child crawling toward her. This vision symbolizes the approach of her happy marriage to a man who loves her. Interpretation of seeing a married woman’s baby in a dream: If a married woman sees a baby in her dream. This vision expresses that she will become pregnant soon. One of the interpretations of a married woman seeing a boy in a dream is that there are many disagreements, problems, and fears.
preview.text: Interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream: One of the goals of a woman’s life is to have a child after marriage, and this stage for a woman is considered one of the happiest stages of a woman’s life because she feels the meaning of motherhood in stages. From her life, the subconscious mind, as we previously learned that because there are many ideas related to the conscious mind, the subconscious mind takes them and presents them in a dream that the girl sees in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a boy and a child in a dream by Ibn SirinIf one sees in a dream a group of male children. This vision expresses his closeness to success and excellence in his life, and his ability to achieve all his goals. If a person sees in a dream a baby being breastfed. This vision symbolizes the abundance of food, and the availability of goodness to whoever sees it. Seeing a person in a dream that he has been blessed with a group of male children. This vision indicates that many troubles are coming, and sorrows will come to the one who sees it, and these pains will go away from the dreamer later. If a young man sees in a dream a small child. This vision symbolizes his close marriage, and getting rid of all the problems and fears that a person faces in his life. Seeing a person in a dream that he is breastfeeding a small child. This vision expresses the forbidden money that this person obtains. Whoever sees in his dream that he is touching a small child. This indicates that he will soon have a lot of money. If one sees in a dream that he is carrying a child. This indicates the high positions that the dreamer will move to and the abundant money that will come to him. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees in a dream a son of an unmarried womanIf an unmarried girl sees a child in her dream. This vision expresses her imminent marriage. Whoever sees a child in his dream and does not remember his characteristics. This vision expresses that he will soon find himself in great trouble. Seeing a boy in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes problems in her love life, which may lead to separation. If a single girl who is suffering from many problems in her life sees a boy in a dream. Such a vision expresses immediate relief for this girl. If an unmarried girl dreams of a boy with baby hair, this indicates her close separation from her lover. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream means that she is carrying a child in her arms. There is someone who loves her very much and wants to communicate with her. A single girl sees herself buying a boy. This vision expresses the presence of many problems and difficulties that she will face soon. Interpretation of seeing a handsome child for an unmarried woman in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a “boy” who is distinguished by her beauty. This vision is the imminent news of her marriage. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream with a beautiful child expresses her repentance, integrity, and abandonment of her sins and violations that she constantly commits. A single girl seeing in a dream a beautiful child crawling toward her. This vision symbolizes the approach of her happy marriage to a man who loves her. Interpretation of seeing a married woman’s baby in a dream: If a married woman sees a baby in her dream. This vision expresses that she will become pregnant soon. One of the interpretations of a married woman seeing a boy in a dream is that there are many disagreements, problems, and fears.

title: Everything you are looking for to interpret the dream of tea in a dream and the interpretation of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about tea? Tea is considered one of the most popular drinks in the world, as tea comes in second place after water in global consumption, and the word tea is basically a Chinese word called the tree from which this drink is made, and the countries of East Asia are among the most productive countries. Therefore, seeing tea in a dream has many meanings that differ depending on the details of the dream, so what does it symbolize? Interpretation of a dream about tea in a dream Tea is generally considered a drink that inspires joy, balance, depth of thought, moderation of opinion, good planning for future matters, and insight into many events that occur in the world. Tea also means Success and excellence in studying, following mathematical tables, taking correct actions, thinking seriously about complex issues and arriving at logical solutions. It also symbolizes interest in the practical side of life, as the viewer may be more willing to apply theories rather than writing them down, unlike coffee, which symbolizes To the man who tends to write and invent theories. Coffee is a building drawn on paper, while tea is an application on paper on the ground. Tea indicates close relationships, stable friendships, lasting friendship, calmness, entertainment, and getting to know people. If he sees in his dream that his hand is trembling when Making tea or pouring it into his cup, this indicates hesitation and confusion in making the right decision or standing in the middle of things until the dreamer finds himself not knowing which way to take, right or left. If the cup is empty, this indicates a lack of work and a feeling of emptiness and emptiness, which leads to Engaging in useless talk and bad talk about others, spreading a spirit of quarreling, and relaying the sayings that such-and-such heard and transmitted. To the public and the violation of privacy. Tea also symbolizes the psychological state that the viewer is experiencing, because it is a reflection of reality. If the dreamer is angry or upset while drinking tea, this is an indication of the bad things facing the guard, the pressure on him, and the many demands that make him angry. But if he is happy drinking tea, this indicates a feeling of pleasure and comfort, achieving some desired goals, and success in some work. Tea also expresses About the mood, and a person can drink it in times of distress and surrender, as well as in times of comfort and happiness. In a young man’s dream, it symbolizes the plans he is pursuing and serious thinking about his future and the coming days, or the dream serves as a notification to him of imminent relief and obtaining a job according to his ambitions and ideas. Drinking tea With friends, it is evidence of friendship, the exchange of opinions, or the existence of joint work between them in the near future, but if he drinks it with some strangers, this indicates cooperation in work, making important agreements, or sharing and gaining experiences. Seeing tea in abundance is evidence of an abundance of food, a blessing in life, and the presence of pressure. Big on the interests he manages and the profits he will make from them. If the dreamer sees that he is drinking tea alone, this indicates a situation in which

title: What is the interpretation of 500 riyals in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of 500 riyals in a dream? We can say that seeing money in a dream is one of the most important dreams common among people around the world, and this is due to several main reasons, the most important of which is that money occupies human thought over time, and this is what prompts the subconscious mind to translate that thought into the form of dreams. In addition, seeing money is a message from God Almighty, which is why dream interpretation scholars disagree about the difference in interpretation associated with it. To see money in paper or metal form, as recent studies have proven that there is a big difference between seeing a coin in metal or paper form. , based on a set of foundations and rules on which it was based.Interpretation of 500 riyals in a dream Dream interpretation scholars interpreted seeing 00 riyals in a dream as one of the good visions that indicate goodness and happiness for the dreamer. When the dreamer sees that he has lost 00 riyals in a dream, this is an undesirable sign. In it because it expresses disobedience to God. This vision for an unmarried girl indicates that her marriage is imminent on earth, and for a married woman, it is good news that she has the ability to buy it, and for a pregnant woman it is an indication of her birth. And the girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of banknotes in a dream: Seeing 00 riyals in a dream is one of the dreams of seeing a banknote, and its meanings can be seen as follows: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing money in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a lot of money in a dream is an indication of kindness and the abundance of food in the money in reality. When the dreamer sees that he is paying a lot of money to others, this is a sign of accumulating debts that the dreamer must pay, and it is also a sign of the dreamer being late in obeying God. If one sees a banknote in a dream, this vision means that the married dreamer will give birth to a child, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees red banknotes, this indicates the dreamer’s good condition, direction, and commitment to obeying God. When the dreamer sees that he has lost his money, this is an unfavorable sign for him. Because it expresses that he is exposed to something annoying in reality, it may be due to his failure to obey God. When you see five banknotes containing money, this indicates the dreamer’s insistence on performing the five daily prayers. If you dream of seeing a treasure of money, this is a sign of goodness and abundance. Money. Interpretation of a dream about money by Ibn Shaheen. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he finds paper money with the word of God written on it, then this is a promising sign of his good condition and direction in reality. When the dreamer sees that he is borrowing money even though he does not need the money, this indicates the dreamer’s duality in reality. In his appearance before others with a personality different from his real personality. When you see yourself finding money in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is facing many problems that prevent him from achieving what he dreams about in reality. If the dreamer finds money in the dream and leaves it and does not take it, then this is news. Good for achieving what the dreamer wants in reality. Seeing yourself spending money in a dream indicates a state of peace and psychological peace that the dreamer will enjoy. About

title: Interpretation of the length of the month in a dream

preview.html: When interpreting the length of the month in a dream, we can say that dream interpretation is one of the most prominent sciences that has achieved remarkable development in recent years, as scientists in this field have reached many rules and foundations that make it possible to apply science with greater accuracy and quality than it was, and this has directly contributed to the ability of the average person to interpret his dreams, either by reading the books published by these scientists or by searching various Internet sites, taking into account the choice of reliable sources. Interpretation of the length of the month in a dream There are those who dream of visions that indicate dates that indicate the day, month or year, and some expect that a specific thing will happen on that date on Earth. The scholar Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi stated it as follows: Interpretation of seeing the month of Muharram in a dream If the dreamer sees the month of Muharram in a dream, this vision carries many positive signs, including: It is considered joyful news, meaning that the dreamer will be cured of any disease and released from prison if he is imprisoned, and it also indicates the help of a person and his salvation from enemies. The dreamer takes a high position and status if he wants it from God Almighty, and if he is poor, God Almighty will make him rich. The meaning of this dream is that the dreamer witnesses a major calamity on earth, such as the emergence of a scholar or the death of an imam who is characterized by justice and piety. If the dreamer travels and withdraws from his people, this vision means that he will return to his people again. If the dreamer is traveling and afraid of drowning and winds, this dream means that he and those with him will be saved from all harm. It indicates God Almighty's repentance to the dreamer in the event of his disobedience and committing his sins. This dream indicates the dreamer's return from his sins, misguidance and haste. If the dreamer desires a righteous son, this dream means that God will bless him with a son in reality. The dreamer will return to his place if he moved away from it. Perhaps this vision is a sign that Muslims will receive a great reward and booty. Interpretation of seeing the month of Safar in a dream If the dreamer sees a month of travel in a dream, this is an indication of certain indications. The dream of this month does not bring with it much good, but it also does not bring much bad to people who have suffered from heartbreak or distress. If the dreamer is sick, this vision is evidence of enjoying health and recovery. From diseases. Interpretation of seeing Rabi al-Awwal in a dream Perhaps this vision indicates the birth of a righteous son and the end of all hardships and pains. If the dreamer is a merchant, this means that he feels happy and joyful, his trade will be profitable and blessings will increase. This dream may indicate the victory of the oppressed and the death of the distress or ordeal that befell the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about the month of Rabi al-Akhir If the dream is in the month of Rabi al-Thani, this means that the dreamer gives birth to a son who is a hero or a scholar, and it also indicates his victory over enemies. If the vision shows evil, this means its rapid appearance, acceleration, and if it is good, this means that its appearance is slow on earth. Interpretation of seeing the month of Jumada al-Awwal in a dream When we see this month in a dream, this is an unpleasant vision
